en.title: FusionExcel Welcomes Quantum Pendant Wearer US Senator Rory Respicio!
en.content:
SPECIAL REPORT FROM THE PHILIPPINES LICENSEE JEREMY LOOI.
US Senator Respicio, Son-in-law of FE's Hawaii/Guam Licensee Jimmy Dee 
Paid a Courtesy Visit to the Philippines Country Licensee's Metro Manila Office, Picture with Jeremy Looi.
Left-Right : Senator Rory Respicio, First Gentleman Jose Miguel Arroyo, 
President Gloria Macapagal Arroyo and Mr. Alfredo O. Antolin, Jr. President and CEO, Affinity Corporation.
09th July, Senator Rory Respicio met with Philippine Overseas Employment Administration officials in Mandaluyong, Philippines. The discussion points revolved around the recruitment of manpower for the Guam military buildup. During the visit the Senator expressed  positive sentiments of the Filipino labor force on Guam. 

"Filipinos are hardworking, they're loyal, and they're very, very industrious." Senator Respicio also shared his personal thoughts when he said "we have affinity for foreign workers, especially for Filipinos."

 

The senator made assurances that the projected 15,000 to 20,000 job openings on Guam in 2010 related to the military buildup will be open to Filipinos.

meta.description:
FE's Thai Country Licensee and Presidential Director Don Chan recently held an event at the 5 Star Don Chan Palace Hotel ( what a coincidence, Don,to have a hotel named after you ! ) in Vientiane, Laos on 15th August 2009. There were 700 attendees including many VIPs, high society people and doctors ( Dr Maneechan, Dr Buangem, Surgeon, Dr Weingsan, Anaesthetician, etc) . Everyone was impressed with the presentations and demos of FE's Quantum Pendant. There were sharings by Don Chan and FE Leaders. At the event 3 new Laotian FE Directors were presented with their certificates.
Congratulations, Don! It is great to see your network growing strongly overseas outside of Thailand. FE is truly a global platform for our Leaders !
AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
meta.author: klhunter
